game.name: TrollFace Quest Horror 1
game.description:
Do scary movies give you those Goosebumps you seek for deliberately? Are you among those for whom scrolling the creepy scenes and images is a great fun? Join Troll Face Quest Horror and be prepared to become a part of the most terrifyingly hilarious pranks! You would be amazed to meet with multiple popular characters that you watched in many of your favorite TV shows, horror films and even video games. The creepy monsters and the sky darkens are waiting for you to lurk in the shadows.

Put your wits and cleverness to the test to challenge the notorious trickster, TrollFace in this HTML5 magic game! Hey! He is not alone this time, but accompanied by a horde of multiple monsters. Practice your trolling abilities to beat this jokester like never before! These nightmarish characters will take you on the most thrilling and entertaining journey. Solve out the puzzles by clicking on the right objects in each level in this brand new arcade game!

You would have 16 unique and challenging levels to play through. Only the first level you can explore. However, you can move and unlock the rest only if you solve the puzzle of the present one. Get a chance to meet with different and infamous characters while going through multiple levels right from fierce Gremlins to Samara! Do not hesitate in applying different combinations during the gameplay. Keep clicking on the one single item in several levels. Find a solution by clicking the hints button shown at the top of the screen! Good luck to survive through all the levels and prove TrollFace that you are smarter than him!
